data.name: Cake Toppers India
data.about: Online store offering a wide range of cake toppers and cake decorating accessories for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, baby showers and more.
data.description: Cake Toppers India is a real online shop selling cake toppers, accessories and custom designs for celebrations across India. Offers customized cake toppers for many occasions and decorative tools to make cakes stand out. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
data.question: What kind of cake topper are you looking for?
